name: Lightspeed Venture Partners
tag_list: venture-capital, consumer-tech, gaming, e-commerce, mobile, enterprise, vc, lightspeed, semiconductors, cleantech
overview:
Lightspeed Venture Partners is an early stage venture capital firm with teams in Menlo Park, China, India, and Israel. Lightspeed focuses on investments in enterprise infrastructure, internet media and commerce, mobile, digital media and cleantech.

Past notable investments include Nicira, Fushion-io, Playdom, Kosmix, Pliant Technology, Brocade, Blue Nile, Ciena, DoubleClick, Phone.com, and Riverbed.

Selected consumer investments include:

  • Bonobos
  • GrubHub
  • Lemon
  • Living Social
  • Kixeye
  • Nest
  • Thefind.com
  • The Honest Company
  • Snapchat
  • Shoedazzle
  • TaskRabbit

Selected enterprise investments include:

  • AppDynamics
  • Boundry
  • Delphix
  • Embrane
  • MapR Technology
  • Nimble Storage
  • Nutanix
  • DataStax
  • Tintri

image.attribution: David Chen on LinkedIn
